name: SizeConstraintSet
description: The AWS::WAF::SizeConstraintSet resource specifies a size constraint that AWS WAF uses to check the size of a web request and which parts of the request to check. For more information, see CreateSizeConstraintSet in the AWS WAF API Reference.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A friendly name or description for the SizeConstraintSet.

properties.name: SizeConstraints
properties.description: The size constraint and the part of the web request to check.
